title: Learning Environment Design Based on Representative Co-Design for Athlete Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sports science knowledge and fundamental learning techniques
context.additional_context: Real-time interactive education for large-scale learners in smartphone-centric online environments

learning_goals: Learners can understand and explain task design principles reflecting real-world competition scenarios
Learners can collaboratively co-design meaningful learning activities through peer collaboration
Learners can apply at least three practical strategies to enhance psychological engagement

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
